channel.title: Toxic on funPlantGenes
channel.description: Recent content in Toxic on funPlantGenes

item.title: BnaMs3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: BnaC9.Tic40 Gene Symbol: BnaMs3 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Brassica napus Functional Descriptions: In Brassica napus, the widely used genic male sterile breeding system 7365ABC is controlled by two young genes, Bnams4b and BnaMs3.

item.title: Bnams4b
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: Bnams4b Gene Name: Brassica napus male sterile 4 Genome: Species: Brassica napus Functional Descriptions: Ectopic expression of AtBRUTUS (AtBTS) and comparison between Bnams4b-transgenic Arabidopsis and bts mutants suggested that Bnams4b may drive translocation of BTS to cause various toxic defects.

item.title: GmMATE100
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.18G143700 Gene Symbol: GmMATE100 Gene Name: MATE-type soyasaponin transporter Genome: G.

item.title: LjMATE1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: LjMATE1 Gene Name: multidrug and toxic compound extrusion (MATE) protein1 Genome: Species: Lotus japonicus Functional Descriptions: LjMATE1: A Citrate Transporter Responsible for Iron Supply to the Nodule Infection Zone of Lotus japonicus.

item.title: MND8
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: HORVU5Hr1G118820 Gene Symbol: MND8 Gene Name: Genome: barley cultivar Morex V1 Species: Hordeum vulgare Functional Descriptions: Collectively, our results indicated that MND8ynp5 is a novel allele of the HORVU5Hr1G118820 gene that is possibly responsible for the shortened plastochron and many noded dwarf phenotype in barley.

item.title: SbMATE
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Sb03g043890 Gene Symbol: SbMATE Gene Name: multi-drug and toxic compound extrusion Genome: Species: Sorghum bicolor Functional Descriptions: Sugarcane plants constitutively overexpressing the Sorghum bicolor MATE gene (SbMATE) showed improved tolerance to Al when compared to non-transgenic (NT) plants, characterized by sustained root growth and exclusion of aluminum from the root apex based on the result obtained with hematoxylin staining.

item.title: Sl23DOX
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Solyc02g062460 Gene Symbol: Sl23DOX Gene Name: C-23 hydroxylase Genome: Sol Genomics Network (http://solgenomics.

item.title: TaMATE1B
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: TaMATE1B Gene Name: multidrug and toxic compound extrusion Genome: Species: Triticum aestivum Functional Descriptions: Transposon-Mediated Alteration of TaMATE1B Expression in Wheat Confers Constitutive Citrate Efflux from Root Apices.
